def calculate_good_extensions_sum(s: str, MOD: int=998244354) -> int:
    n = len(s)
    pre = 0
    c = 0
    res = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if pre != s[i]:
            c = 1
        else:
            c *= 2
        c %= MOD
        res += c
        pre = s[i]
    return res % MOD
